Summary: siluette with redish black circles on all three sides
divs: Sighting DetailsI came home from work I went outside to my patio to smoke, and during I looked up in the sky to watch the stars, it relaxes me. I happened to see a siluette above me and followed the siluette and noticed it was a UFO. Shocked, I just stood there in awe following it with my eyes as it hovered in a straight path until it was gone. No noise at all, almost a slight low tone pulsating sound, everything was quite and seemed to be the only thing I could hear.
